Reviews.Content: Not Bad I liked the service scenes and we had clean linen on the bed was clean the ice machine and vending machines working good , Th air condition perfect. It was quiet like we like it my husband and I liked it we would stay again we give it a 3 star

Reviews.Title: “The worst customer service i've ever had”
Reviews.Author: UN-EDITED
Reviews.Content: The staff is very rude, and the rooms are very dirty.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible, disgusting, unforgettable ...”
Reviews.Author: tmcneal
Reviews.Content: So my boyfriend and I decided to check out the Hub Motel because it was in a great location and decent prices. We arrive and the clerk barely speaks English, which we didn't really mind at first. We got our room key and headed upstairs. First off, the bed had NO fitted sheet on the mattress, only a flat sheet with a comforter and pillows. Therefore, every time we would move on the bed, the sheets would move as well. As I got up to use the bathroom, the sheets had moved along with the pillows, and I looked down and I saw a huge blood stain on the mattress. I was speechless. I made my boyfriend look at it to make sure it really was blood, instead maybe wine or some sort of liquid. It definitely appeared to be blood. At this point, I was freaking out. I was up the whole night, trying to pick up other things that are wrong with the room. The curtains in the room were torn and ripped in various spots, and the carpet beneath the curtain had ANOTHER blood stain (near the window.) . Disgusting. We happened to leave the next morning before the check out time. Later that day, my boyfriend called the police and reported what we have encountered at the Hub motel. Police said they were going to send 2 cars to check it out. And that was the last that I heard. So, please don't EVER stay here. I honestly will never forget that night.

Reviews.Title: “If you like tha projects... you've come home !!!!”
Reviews.Author: Datachick1213
Reviews.Content: This place smelled bad. I was so sorry I didn't pay the extra $10 and stay across the street; It's pretty bad when the counter help dosen't speak english. I guess that security guard was supposed to be reassuring but seeing him sleeping at his post wasn't anything of the sort; The shower didn't have any hot water to speak of, nor did they bother to provide toilet paper when the 1/2 roll I had ran out. Save yourself frustration and disgust, spend $10 more and go somewhere a little less nasty.

Reviews.Title: “The Health Department Should Shut This Down Immediately”
Reviews.Author: 4Mew
Reviews.Content: This "motel" was the most disgusting place I have ever seen in my 34 years on the planet. Although they have the best rates I have ever seen, it is not worth it, pay the extra $10.00 to stay at a more reputable and also cleaner place. I was forced to spend the evening with my daughter and good thing that I carry a blanket in the car. We used that blanket and our coats to lie on and cover up. There were various stains on the walls, including something that looked like slime (it was probably [--]). The floor had not been vacuumed, and the bathroom floor has nor been swept or mopped. As I was "checking out", I noticed another single mother checking in and asked her if she had ever stayed there and she stated "unfortunately yes", I kept saying "horrible, horrible, horrible", and all she could say was "Yes I know, believe me, I know".

Reviews.Title: “Stay here if you love filth”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Between the crack heads and the winos. The rats and the roaches was the high point of this stay. Place was dirty, workers are nasty. When I rent a room , it shouldnt come with romm mates. This was the worst motel we ever stay at. Wife is still having nightmares. We are thinkin she may need therapy. Philly is a dirty city and this motel reflects the people whom live it in, I would NEVER stay here again or visit philly PA

HotelInfo.Name: Hub Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 7605 Roosevelt Blvd., Philadelphia, PA 19152
